name: Wide Putin 64
description: Wide Putin 64 is an incredible action packed first person mystery strategy adventure game. The goal is simple, unlock the door to the outside. Why? Because these are Putin's halls, that's why. But the door is locked, and you must acquire 4 separate keys to unlock your way to freedom!  In order to find the keys, you must jump into the 4 paintings scattered around the halls. Good luck!
